physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Meeting Hall, Membership Dinner and Induction, Feb 17, 1959, BB Bldg, #406 B'nai B'rith 171.'' Stamped on back of photograph: ''jack j. goldman, commercial photography, 1473 holly st. de. 3-8673, denver 20, colorado.''

mods.abstract: Several men sit at tables in a large room at the B'nai B'rith Building during a membership dinner and induction. Eight men are standing at the front of the room holding a rope. A speaker stands on a stage with two men sitting on either side of him.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
